isFocusable().Description: Matches @B_android#support#test#espresso#Root_E@s that can take window focus.

isTouchable().Description: Matches @B_android#support#test#espresso#Root_E@s that can receive touch events.

isPlatformPopup().Description: Matches @B_android#support#test#espresso#Root_E@s that are popups - like autocomplete suggestions or the actionbar spinner.

isDialog().Description: Matches @B_android#support#test#espresso#Root_E@s that are dialogs (i.e. is not a window of the currently resumed activity).

ClassDesc: A collection of matchers for @B_android#support#test#espresso#Root_E@ objects.
